Detailed Description

A client for the Wordnik Network API.

Member Function Documentation

- (void) addObserver: (id<WNClientObserver>)  observer

Add a WNClientObserver.

Like delegates, observers will not be retained.

Parameters:
observerThe observer to add.
See also:
- removeObserver:
- (WNRequestTicket *) addWord: (NSString *)  word
toListWithIdentifier: (WNWordListIdentifier *)  identifier 

Request that the given word string be added to a list.

Request progress may be monitored by implementiong the WNClientObserver protocol and registering your observer via addObserver:.

Parameters:
wordThe word string to add.
identifierThe unique identifier of the list.
Note:
This method requires authentication.
- (WNRequestTicket *) addWord: (NSString *)  word
toListWithIdentifier: (WNWordListIdentifier *)  identifier
completionBlock: (NSError *error)  completionBlock 

Request that the given word string be added to a list.

Parameters:
wordThe word string to add.
identifierThe unique identifier of the list.
completionBlockThe block to call on successful completion or error. If an error occurs, a non-nil error in the WNErrorDomain will be provided. On success, the error argument will be nil.
Note:
This method requires authentication.
- (WNRequestTicket *) autocompletedWordsWithRequest: (WNWordSearchRequest *)  request

Request progress may be monitored by implementiong the WNClientObserver protocol and registering your observer via addObserver:.

Parameters:
requestThe autocompletion request.
- (WNRequestTicket *) autocompletedWordsWithRequest: (WNWordSearchRequest *)  request
completionBlock: (WNWordSearchResponse *response, NSError *error)  completionBlock 

Submit a request for words that match a given word fragment.

Parameters:
requestThe autocompletion request.
completionBlockThe block to call on successful completion or error. If an error occurs, response will be nil and a non-nil error in the WNErrorDomain will be provided. On success, a non-nil response will be provided.

- (WNRequestTicket *) loginWithCredentials: (WNClientCredentials *)  credentials

Submit an authentication request with the provided credentials.

Authentication progress may be monitored by implementiong the WNClientObserver protocol and registering your observer via addObserver:.

Parameters:
credentialsAuthentication credentials.
Invariant:
If any other authentication request is pending, it will be cancelled.
If the client is currently authenticated, it will be logged out prior to attempting authentication.
If a pending login request is superceded by a later login or logout request, it will fail with a WNErrorCodeRequestConflict error.
- (WNRequestTicket *) loginWithCredentials: (WNClientCredentials *)  credentials
completionBlock: (NSError *error)  completionBlock 

Submit an authentication request with the provided credentials, and call completionBlock upon completion.

Parameters:
credentialsAuthentication credentials.
completionBlockThe block to call upon completion or error. On success, the error parameter will be nil. On failure, an error in the WNErrorDomain will be provided.
Invariant:
If any other authentication request is pending, it will be cancelled.
If the client is currently authenticated, it will be logged out prior to attempting authentication.
If a pending login request is superceded by a later login or logout request, it will fail with a WNErrorCodeRequestConflict error.
- (void) removeObserver: (id<WNClientObserver>)  observer

Remove a WNClientObserver.

Parameters:
observerThe observer to remove.

Submit a request for the current word of the day.

Parameters:
completionBlockThe block to call on successful completion or error. If an error occurs, response will be nil and a non-nil error in the WNErrorDomain will be provided. On success, a non-nil response will be provided.
- (WNRequestTicket *) wordsFromListWithIdentifier: (WNWordListIdentifier *)  identifier

Submit a request for all word strings in the given list.

Request progress may be monitored by implementiong the WNClientObserver protocol and registering your observer via addObserver:.

Parameters:
identifierThe unique identifier of the list.
Note:
This method requires authentication.
- (WNRequestTicket *) wordsFromListWithIdentifier: (WNWordListIdentifier *)  identifier
completionBlock: (NSArray *words, NSError *error)  completionBlock 

Submit a request for all word strings in the given list.

Parameters:
identifierThe unique identifier of the list.
completionBlockThe block to call on successful completion or error. If an error occurs, words will be nil and a non-nil error in the WNErrorDomain will be provided. On success, a non-nil words argument will be provided.
Note:
This method requires authentication.
- (WNRequestTicket *) wordsWithRequests: (NSArray *)  wordRequests

Submit a batched word request.

Request progress may be monitored by implementiong the WNClientObserver protocol and registering your observer via addObserver:.

Parameters:
wordRequestsAn ordered array of WNWordRequest instances.
- (WNRequestTicket *) wordsWithRequests: (NSArray *)  wordRequests
completionBlock: (NSArray *responses, NSError *error)  completionBlock 

Submit a batched word request.

Parameters:
wordRequestsAn ordered array of WNWordRequest instances.
completionBlockThe block to call on successful completion or error. If an error occurs, responses will be nil and a non-nil error in the WNErrorDomain will be provided.
- (WNRequestTicket *) wordWithRequest: (WNWordRequest *)  request

Submit a word request.

Request progress may be monitored by implementiong the WNClientObserver protocol and registering your observer via addObserver:.

Parameters:
requestThe word request to submit to the server.
- (WNRequestTicket *) wordWithRequest: (WNWordRequest *)  request
completionBlock: (WNWordResponse *response, NSError *error)  completionBlock 

Submit a word request.

Parameters:
requestThe word request to submit to the server.
completionBlockThe block to call on successful completion or error. If an error occurs, response will be nil and a non-nil error in the WNErrorDomain will be provided.
